h1.span: Covid 19 - All School Updates & Resources - Click on each link for more information

span.style: color: #0000ff; font-family: garamond, times new roman, serif; font-size: large;

p.span: One of the many issues that we are dealing with as a result of the school closure is grading and report cards. At this time, no definitie decisions have been made, but once that happens, a separate message will go out to all families with an explanation. For now, we will be closing the parent portal in Real Time to allow teachers to continue collecting and organizing assessment data to the extent possible. Teachers will continue providing students with feedback using Google Classroom and email.

p.a: Essential Child Care for Essential Personnel

span.style: color: #0000ff; font-family: times new roman, serif; font-size: large;

p.span: The school will be closed for all teachers and support staff, except for custodians. However, the staff is fully equipped to work remotely from home, so if you have any questions or concerns, please send them via email.

span.style: color: #0000ff; font-family: times new roman, serif; font-size: large;
